Address.Address1: 203-211 Nguyen Van Linh, Thanh Khe Dist

Description.Text:
Property Location
A stay at Samdi Hotel places you in the heart of Da Nang, convenient to Chi Lang Stadium and Museum of Cham Sculpture. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of Han Market and Dragon Bridge.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 109 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and flat-screen televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms have rainfall showerheads and complimentary toiletries. Conveniences include phones, as well as laptop-compatible safes and desks.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Relax at the full-service spa, where you can enjoy massages and facials. You're sure to appreciate the recreational amenities, including an indoor pool and a fitness center. This hotel also features complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and wedding services. The shuttle (surcharge) will take you to the nearby beach or shopping center.

Dining
Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's restaurant, which serves breakfast, lunch, and dinner. Dining is also available at a coffee shop/café, and 24-hour room service is provided. Relax with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge or a poolside bar.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a business center, complimentary newspapers in the lobby, and dry cleaning/laundry services. Planning an event in Da Nang? This hotel has 2153 square feet (200 square meters) of space consisting of a conference center, conference space, and meeting rooms. For a surcharge, guests may use a shuttle from the hotel to the airport (available 24 hours) and a train station pick-up service.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 2:00 PM Check-out time is noon
Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's restaurant, which serves breakfast, lunch, and dinner. Dining is also available at a coffee shop/café, and 24-hour room service is provided. Relax with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge or a poolside bar.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Chi Lang Stadium - 1.4 km / 0.9 mi
Museum of Cham Sculpture - 1.5 km / 0.9 mi
Han Market - 2 km / 1.2 mi
Dragon Bridge - 2 km / 1.3 mi
Han River Bridge - 2.2 km / 1.4 mi
Da Nang City Administration Center - 2.5 km / 1.6 mi
Vincom - 2.8 km / 1.7 mi
My Khe Beach - 4 km / 2.5 mi
Marble Mountains - 8.4 km / 5.2 mi
Linh Ung Pagoda - 8.7 km / 5.4 mi
Non Nuoc Beach - 8.9 km / 5.5 mi
Son Tra Mountain - 10.2 km / 6.4 mi
Ba Na Hills Cable Car - 19.4 km / 12.1 mi

The preferred airport for Samdi Hotel is Da Nang (DAD-Da Nang Intl.) - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Message.Text:
Essential Information: Room 1

No amendments or name changes can be made to this booking once it is confirmed.

Hotel Tariff Notes: No show and early departure will be subjected to 100% charge. No date, name and room change allowed. Bookings including children will be based on sharing parents bedding, no separate bed for children is provided unless other stated.
